title: Snow White 2001 DVDR R4 NTSC ENG
description:
There should be no fairy tale of the Brothers Grimm most adored the legend of a beautiful young woman who runs away from home because of a jealous stepmother. Now, more exciting than in any other version, Snow White appears to us as a fantasy story with a truly epic scale.
With wonderful performances and a brilliant argument, this modern version offers the first classic elements of the story of Snow White, as his miraculous birth or the mysterious reasons that led his father to marry again after her mother's death. Miranda Richardson (Merlin) plays the Queen Elspeth, the beautiful but vain stepmother whose desire to be "the most beautiful land to the top of the" leads to plotting to kill the one who can rival that title. Kristin Kreuk ("Smallville") is Snow White, the charming young princess who is forced to flee into the forest, where you will find shelter and protection of a bunch of quirky little men.
Snow White is a magical adventure with such dazzling special effects and unforgettable characters that will instantly captivate the heart - and imagination - of a whole new generation.
